attributes.action: hold a full public inquiry into the London bombings of July 7 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More than a year after that terrible atrocity that killed at least 52 people and maimed many more, there still hasn't been a full public inquiry into that event. The "Narrative" and the ISC report we were given are insufficient. We've had public inquiries into far less serious events, why not this? We now know that the attacks did not come "out of the blue" as was asserted by the Home Secretary at the time.

government_responses.details:
